explanation: For patients with unexplained losses, we use the 'TLC Protocol'. Frequent scans (weekly), progesterone support, and emotional counseling.
next_steps: Stress reduction is actually a medical intervention here.
reassurance: We will hold your hand through the first 12 weeks.

explanation: Is baar hum extra careful rahenge. Har hafte scan karenge taaki aapko tasalli rahe.
next_steps: Jab bhi darr lage, call karein.
reassurance: Stress hormone (Cortisol) kam rakhna zaroori hai.

explanation: We saw 'Chocolate Cysts' (Endometriomas) on your ovaries. This confirms Endometriosis. It creates a toxic environment that damages egg quality and makes tubes sticky.
next_steps: We should not delay. The cysts eat away at healthy ovarian tissue. IVF is the fastest route.
reassurance: While natural conception is hard, IVF bypasses the tubes and pelvic environment completely.

explanation: Report mein ovaries mein cysts dikhe hain. Isse 'Endometriosis' kehte hain. Ye pregnancy mein rukawat dalta hai.
next_steps: Hume jaldi IVF plan karna chahiye kyunki ye samay ke saath badhta hai.
reassurance: IVF se success mil sakti hai.

explanation: Your cysts are very large (>4cm) and painful. I recommend Laparoscopy to clean the pelvis BEFORE we start IVF.
next_steps: Surgery removes the toxic fluid and frees the ovaries for better access during retrieval.
reassurance: This 'cleanup' can improve implantation rates significantly.

explanation: Dr. {{doctor_name}} advises removing the endometrioma first.
next_steps: It is a keyhole surgery (day care). You can start IVF 1 month later.
reassurance: Pain relief will be immediate.

explanation: Before transfer, we need to calm the endometriosis. You will take 'Lupron Depot' injection once a month for 2 months.
next_steps: This puts you in temporary menopause to shrink the inflammation.
reassurance: Hot flashes are normal side effects. It resets the uterus for the baby.

explanation: Transfer se pehle hum 2 mahine uterus ko 'shaant' karenge Lupron injection se.
next_steps: Period band ho jayega kuch time ke liye.
reassurance: Isse implantation failure ka risk kam hota hai.

explanation: Your uterus appears 'bulky' and asymmetrical. This is Adenomyosis - where the lining grows into the muscle wall.
next_steps: This acts like a natural contraceptive coil. We must treat it before putting an embryo in.
reassurance: It is not cancer, just a variant of endometriosis.

explanation: Diagnosis: Adenomyosis. The uterine wall is thickened.
next_steps: We will use 'Down Regulation' (Long Protocol) to shrink the uterus before FET.
reassurance: With proper suppression, success rates are good.

explanation: Aapka uterus suja hua (bulky) hai. Isse 'Adenomyosis' kehte hain. Periods mein dard isi wajah se hota hai.
next_steps: Davai se isse shrink karenge pehle.
reassurance: Embryo chipakne ke liye uterus ka normal hona zaroori hai.

explanation: Starting injections on Day 21 of THIS cycle (before period starts).
next_steps: Daily Lupride injection to switch off hormones.
reassurance: This prevents adenomyosis flare-up during stimulation.

explanation: Start Lupride 0.5ml daily.
next_steps: Continue until period comes.
reassurance: Suppression phase.

explanation: Even though you have no pain, I suspect 'Silent Endometriosis' is causing the implantation failures.
next_steps: We can do a ReceptivaDx test (biopsy) or treat empirically with 2 months of suppression.
reassurance: Many 'Unexplained' cases are actually silent endo.

explanation: Dard nahi hai iska matlab ye nahi ki Endometriosis nahi hai. Silent Endo bhi failure ka kaaran ho sakta hai.
next_steps: Treatment try karenge next cycle.
reassurance: Empirical treatment safe hai.

explanation: Since you are off birth control for IVF, your endo pain might flare up.
next_steps: Safe painkillers: Meftal-Spas / Paracetamol. Heat pad.
reassurance: It is temporary until you get pregnant (Pregnancy suppresses Endo!).

explanation: You have 'Polycystic Ovary Syndrome' (PCOS). Your ovaries have many small follicles (pearl necklace pattern) and your cycles are irregular.
next_steps: The good news: You have LOTS of eggs. The bad news: They don't release on time.
reassurance: PCOS is the most treatable form of infertility. We just need to trigger ovulation.

explanation: Criteria met: 1. Irregular periods 2. High AMH 3. Ultrasound appearance.
next_steps: We will manage this with diet and medication.
reassurance: You have a high ovarian reserve!

explanation: Aapko PCOS hai. Isme eggs bohot saare bante hain par release nahi hote.
next_steps: Weight control bohot zaroori hai.
reassurance: PCOS patients ke IVF results bohot achhe aate hain.

explanation: Dr prescribed Metformin 500mg. It lowers insulin resistance and improves egg quality.
next_steps: Take with dinner to avoid nausea.
reassurance: It helps reduce miscarriage risk in PCOS.

explanation: Start Metformin SR 500mg tonight.
next_steps: Take with food.
reassurance: Improves ovulation.

explanation: Please start 'Myo-Inositol' sachets daily. It is a vitamin that helps PCOS ovaries function normally.
next_steps: Mix with water, drink twice daily.
reassurance: Natural and safe.

explanation: Myo-Inositol powder shuru karein. Ye egg quality ke liye magic hai PCOS mein.
next_steps: Subah shaam lein.
reassurance: Koi side effect nahi hai.

explanation: Because of PCOS, you are a 'High Responder'. If we are not careful, you can get OHSS (swelling).
next_steps: We will use the 'Antagonist Protocol' and a 'Decapeptyl Trigger' (No HCG). This makes OHSS nearly impossible.
reassurance: Your safety is guaranteed with this modern protocol.

explanation: We will likely get 20+ eggs. We will freeze all embryos and NOT transfer this month.
next_steps: Let body recover. Transfer next month.
reassurance: Freeze-all has higher success rates for PCOS anyway.

explanation: For PCOS, studies show Letrozole works better than Clomid. Clomid thins the lining.
next_steps: Prescribing Letrozole 2.5mg.
reassurance: Higher ovulation rate with this drug.

explanation: I know losing weight is harder with PCOS. But losing just 5% of your body weight can restart natural ovulation.
next_steps: Can we target 3 kgs loss before starting IVF?
reassurance: It will save you money on injections (lower dose needed).

explanation: PCOS mein Sugar aur Maida (Carbs) kam karein. Protein badhayein.
next_steps: Thoda weight loss success rate double kar sakta hai.
reassurance: Hum aapki help karenge.

explanation: For severe PCOS, we can collect immature eggs (without injections) and mature them in the lab (IVM).
next_steps: Avoids OHSS completely.
reassurance: Good option if you are very sensitive to meds.

explanation: Pregnant PCOS patients have higher risk of Gestational Diabetes.
next_steps: We will monitor your sugar levels closely once pregnant.
reassurance: Manageable with diet.

explanation: Continue Metformin till 12 weeks. It prevents miscarriage.
next_steps: Don't stop without asking Dr.
reassurance: Safe for baby.

explanation: Your fallopian tube is swollen and filled with toxic fluid (Hydrosalpinx). This fluid leaks back into the uterus and poisons the embryo.
next_steps: We must clip or remove the tube (Salpingectomy) before transfer.
reassurance: Leaving it reduces IVF success by 50%. Removing it restores success rates to normal.

explanation: Ek tube mein ganda paani bhara hai (Hydrosalpinx). Ye embryo ko maar sakta hai.
next_steps: Operation karke tube band karni padegi.
reassurance: IVF mein tube ki zaroorat nahi hoti, isliye nikalna safe hai.

explanation: You have a fibroid. The location matters more than size.
next_steps: It is 'Submucosal' (inside the cavity). It must be removed hysteroscopically.
reassurance: If we don't remove it, it acts like an IUD and prevents pregnancy.

explanation: Your fibroid is 'Intramural' (in the wall) and not touching the lining.
next_steps: We can ignore it and proceed with IVF.
reassurance: It won't affect the baby.

explanation: Rasoli ka size chhota hai aur raaste mein nahi hai. Operation ki zaroorat nahi.
next_steps: Seedha IVF start karenge.
reassurance: Sab theek hai.

explanation: We will inject your own Platelet Rich Plasma (PRP) into the uterus to boost lining growth.
next_steps: Come fasting. Blood draw -> Process -> Instill.
reassurance: Experimental but shows good results for stubborn linings.

explanation: Lining badhane ke liye PRP (apne khoon ka plasma) use karenge.
next_steps: Kal subah aana hai.
reassurance: Isse growth factors milte hain.

explanation: Since PRP didn't work, we can try G-CSF wash. It stimulates stem cells in the uterus.
next_steps: It is an instillation done in the clinic.
reassurance: We are trying everything to get you to 7mm.

explanation: For Asherman's/Thin lining, Stem Cell therapy is a new frontier. It is still experimental.
next_steps: Bone marrow aspirate -> Inject in uterine artery.
reassurance: Only recommended as last resort.

explanation: Intralipid infusion scheduled for tomorrow. It looks like milk (soy/fat emulsion).
next_steps: Duration: 2-3 hours.
reassurance: Reduces NK cell activity.

explanation: Kal Intralipid drip lagegi immunity ke liye.
next_steps: 3 ghante lagenge.
reassurance: Safe hai.

explanation: Your biopsy shows 'Chronic Endometritis' - a silent infection of the lining. Plasma cells found.
next_steps: Course of Doxycycline antibiotics for 14 days for both you and husband.
reassurance: Curing this often solves implantation failure immediately.

explanation: Biopsy positive for infection. Prescribing antibiotics.
next_steps: Finish course then re-biopsy to confirm clearance (Test of Cure).
reassurance: Very common and treatable.

explanation: Uterus mein purana infection mila hai. Isse embryo chipak nahi raha tha.
next_steps: Antibiotics ka course karein.
reassurance: Theek hone ke baad chances badh jayenge.

explanation: The TB-PCR test is Positive. Genital Tuberculosis is very common in India and causes silent infertility.
next_steps: You need to start AKT (Anti-Koch's Treatment) for 6 months.
reassurance: We cannot do IVF until treatment is complete, but this diagnosis gives us the answer we were looking for.

explanation: Result positive hai. TB ka bacteria mila hai uterus mein.
next_steps: 6 mahine ki dawai (AKT) chalegi.
reassurance: Iska ilaaj poora hone par pregnancy possible hai.

explanation: Doing a 'Mock Transfer' today to map the path to the uterus.
next_steps: Quick 5 min procedure. Full bladder needed.
reassurance: Ensures the real transfer day goes smoothly.

explanation: Diagnostic Hysteroscopy tomorrow. We put a camera to check the cavity.
next_steps: Fasting 6 hours. Short anesthesia.
reassurance: Gold standard for checking implantation site.

explanation: Kal doorbeen ki jaanch (Hysteroscopy) hai.
next_steps: Khali pet aana hai.
reassurance: Koi cheera/taanka (stitch) nahi lagega.

explanation: Your AMH and Scan are done. Results indicate good reserve.
next_steps: No urgent need to freeze eggs unless you plan to delay pregnancy past 35.
reassurance: All good.

explanation: Before you start Chemotherapy, we have a small window to freeze your eggs/embryos.
next_steps: We will do a 'Random Start' protocol immediately, regardless of cycle day.
reassurance: We work with your Oncologist to ensure safety.

context: How to use the Gonal-F Pen.
explanation:
1. Twist the dial to your dose ({{dose}} IU). 
2. Pull the knob out. 
3. Inject in tummy. 
4. Push knob down completely until it reads '0'.
next_steps: Store the pen back in the FRIDGE after use.
reassurance: The needle is microscopic, you will barely feel it.
call_to_action: Check the window shows '0' after injecting.

explanation: Dial ghuma kar dose {{dose}} set karein. Knob bahar khinchein aur inject karein.
next_steps: Injection ke baad wapis fridge mein rakhna zaroori hai.
reassurance: Ye pen bohot easy hai, dard nahi hota.

explanation:
You have Powder vials and Water (Solvent) ampoules. 
Rule: You can mix up to 3 powders in 1 ml of water to minimize liquid volume.
next_steps: Snap the water top -> Draw water -> Inject into powder -> Dissolve -> Draw back.
reassurance: Don't worry about bubbles, just flick them out.

explanation: Mix {{dose}} powders in 1 water.
next_steps: Inject immediately.
reassurance: Subcutaneous (Tummy).

explanation: This 'Antagonist' injection prevents ovulation. It lasts exactly 24 hours.
next_steps: You MUST take it at the same time every day (e.g., 10 AM). If you are late, you risk ovulating and losing the eggs.
reassurance: Redness/itching at the site is very common for this specific drug. It fades in an hour.

context: Ye injection time pe lena zaroori hai.
explanation: Cetrotide eggs ko à¤«à¥‚à¤Ÿne se rokta hai. Agar late kiya toh eggs nikal jayenge.
next_steps: Roz subah fix time pe lein.
reassurance: Thodi khujli (itching) normal hai.

explanation: This is the 3.75mg Depot injection. It works for one whole month.
next_steps: It is an IM (Intramuscular) injection, so come to the clinic or call a nurse home.
reassurance: You might not get a period next month - that is the expected effect.

explanation: Apply {{dose}} pumps of Estrogel on arms or thighs.
next_steps: Spread thin, let dry for 5 mins before dressing. Do not apply on breasts or genitals.
reassurance: Absorbs better than pills for some patients.

explanation: Gel ko haath ya jaangh (thighs) par lagana hai. Breast par NAHI lagana.
next_steps: Sookhne dein.
reassurance: Skin se dawai seedha blood mein jati hai.

explanation: Since you have vaginal irritation, you can insert the progesterone capsules rectally (bum).
next_steps: Absorption is actually excellent rectally.
reassurance: It avoids leakage and irritation.

explanation: Dr said to insert the blue 'Progynova' pills VAGINALLY today.
next_steps: Yes, they are oral pills, but vaginal use acts directly on the uterus lining.
reassurance: Don't worry, it's safe and standard protocol.

explanation:
Myth: Papaya/Pineapple causes miscarriage. 
Fact: Ripe papaya is perfectly safe. Raw (green) papaya should be avoided.
next_steps: Eat a balanced diet. No single fruit causes abortion.
reassurance: Enjoy your fruit salad!

explanation: Paka hua papita (Ripe Papaya) kha sakte hain. Sirf kaccha papita avoid karein.
next_steps: Ghar ke bade mana karte hain, par medically ye safe hai.
reassurance: Tension na lein.

explanation: You CAN climb stairs after embryo transfer. The embryo does not fall out.
next_steps: Climb slowly, avoid rushing.
reassurance: Gravity does not affect implantation.

explanation: Transfer ke baad seedhiyan chadhna safe hai. Embryo girta nahi hai.
next_steps: Aaram se chadein.
reassurance: Bed rest ki zaroorat nahi hai.

explanation: You asked about 'Garam Taseer' foods like chicken, dates, or eggs. In IVF, protein is your best friend.
next_steps: Please eat eggs and chicken. They build the lining and eggs.
reassurance: The concept of heat causing miscarriage is a myth. Protein is essential.

explanation: You can travel (Flight/Train) during stimulation. Avoid travel on Retrieval Day and Transfer Day.
next_steps: Carry meds in a cool bag with ice packs.
reassurance: Vibrations/bumps do not stop implantation.

explanation: Train ya Flight safe hai. Bas Transfer wale din avoid karein.
next_steps: Injections ko thanda rakhna mat bhoolna.
reassurance: Jhatke lagne se embryo nahi girta.

explanation: During stimulation, ovaries are large, so sex might be painful. Avoid it near retrieval time.
next_steps: Post-transfer: Avoid for 2 weeks until heartbeat scan.
reassurance: After the heartbeat is seen, normal activity is fine.

explanation: Laptops/WiFi do NOT cause implantation failure. You can work normally.
next_steps: Avoid placing a hot laptop directly on your tummy.
reassurance: Stress from *not* working is often worse than working!

explanation: Since you are coming from {{city}}, we can minimize your stay.
next_steps: Do scans locally. Come to us only for Pickup (Day 10-14) and Transfer.
reassurance: We will coordinate with your local doctor.

explanation: Aapko poora mahina rukne ki zaroorat nahi hai. Shuru ke scans apne sheher mein karwa lein.
next_steps: Sirf main procedure ke liye yahan aana hoga (approx 4-5 din).
reassurance: Hum online guide karenge.

explanation: Here is a list of hotels near the clinic offering patient discounts.
next_steps: Book for {{dates}}.
reassurance: These hotels have fridges for your medication.

explanation: We can courier the stimulation injections to your home city in a cold-chain box.
next_steps: Pay via UPI. Delivery in 24-48 hours.
reassurance: Saves you a trip to the clinic.

explanation: Your Zoom consult with Dr. {{doctor_name}} is at {{time}}.
next_steps: Keep your local reports ready to screen-share.
reassurance: Same quality care as in-person.

greeting: Hi {{patient_name}}! Due date is near! ðŸ¤°
explanation: We are updating our records. Has the baby arrived?
next_steps: Please reply with: Date of Birth, Gender, Weight, Delivery Mode.
reassurance: We keep this strictly confidential.

explanation: Kya baby aa gaya hai? Hume record update karna hai.
next_steps: Photo aur details bhejein.
reassurance: Hume bohot khushi hogi.

explanation: Can we put your miracle baby's photo on our 'Wall of Hope' to inspire other patients?
next_steps: Send a high-res photo if you agree.
reassurance: We hide the name if you prefer.

explanation: Since you are 12 weeks, you graduate to your OB/GYN. When the baby is born, tell the pediatrician it was an IVF baby.
next_steps: Sometimes they do an extra heart echo for IVF babies just to be safe.
reassurance: Otherwise, your pregnancy is now 'Normal'!

explanation: Your first IVF baby is turning 2! You still have {{embryo_count}} frozen embryos with us.
next_steps: If you are planning a sibling, the FET process is much simpler.
reassurance: Your embryos are waiting.

explanation: Aapke frozen embryos abhi bhi clinic mein safe hain. Kya aap dusre baby ke liye plan kar rahe hain?
next_steps: Sirf lining banani hai, injection kam honge.
reassurance: Family complete karne ka sahi time.

explanation: You have embryos in storage for 5 years. If your family is complete, you need to decide what to do.
next_steps: Options: 1. Discard 2. Donate to another couple (Anonymous) 3. Research.
reassurance: There is no right answer, but we need instructions.

explanation: Your success story gives hope to others. Would you mind leaving us a Google Review?
next_steps: Link: [Google Link]
reassurance: You can keep it anonymous if you like.

explanation: If heavy bleeding at night, go to {{hospital_name}} ER.
next_steps: Tell them you are an IVF patient of Dr. {{doctor_name}}.
reassurance: We have informed them.

explanation: Your TSH is {{tsh_value}}. For IVF, we need it below 2.5.
next_steps: Start Thyronorm {{dose}}mcg daily empty stomach.
reassurance: Controlled TSH improves brain development of baby.

explanation: High prolactin (Milk hormone) stops ovulation.
next_steps: Take Cabergoline 0.5mg weekly.
reassurance: Levels drop very fast with meds.

explanation: Your Rubella IgG is negative. This means if you catch German Measles during pregnancy, the baby is at risk.
next_steps: Take the vaccine now. We must wait 1 month before transfer.
reassurance: Better safe than sorry.

explanation: Since husband is travelling on pickup day, he must freeze sperm BEFORE leaving.
next_steps: Come for freezing tomorrow.
reassurance: Frozen sperm is just as good.

explanation: Agar husband retrieval wale din nahi hain, toh pehle sample freeze karwana padega.
next_steps: Emergency mein dikkat na ho.
reassurance: Backup zaroori hai.

explanation: Constipation is common due to progesterone. Do NOT strain.
next_steps: Take Isabgol/Lactulose syrup at night. Drink 3L water.
reassurance: Straining won't push the embryo out, but it's uncomfortable.

explanation: Dawaiyon se pet saaf hone mein dikkat ho sakti hai. Zor mat lagana.
next_steps: Isabgol lein raat ko.
reassurance: Pani zyada piyein.

explanation: Avoid 'White' foods (Rice, Sugar, Bread, Maida).
next_steps: Eat 'Brown' (Multigrain, Oats, Veggies).
reassurance: Lowers insulin -> Better eggs.

explanation: We cannot accept returns of sold meds due to temperature safety rules.
next_steps: You can donate them to a charity patient if sealed.
reassurance: Safety policy.

explanation: Did you test at home? If you had a Trigger Shot (HCG), the home test will show FALSE POSITIVE for 10 days.
next_steps: Wait for the blood test date.
reassurance: Don't celebrate or panic yet.

explanation: Trigger injection ki wajah se urine test positive aa sakta hai jo galat hai.
next_steps: Blood test ka wait karein.
reassurance: False hope se bachein.

explanation: Nausea is a good sign of rising hormones! Eat small frequent meals.
next_steps: Take Doxinate tablet at night if prescribed.
reassurance: Ginger tea helps.

explanation: Hormone drop after cycle can cause temporary shedding (Telogen Effluvium).
next_steps: Continue prenatal vitamins.
reassurance: It grows back in 3 months.

explanation: Progesterone causes oily skin and acne.
next_steps: Use mild cleanser. Do NOT use Retinol/Salicylic acid (unsafe for pregnancy).
reassurance: The 'glow' will come later.

explanation: Fasting without water is dangerous during stimulation (risk of clots) and pregnancy.
next_steps: Please ask your priest/imam for exemption due to medical treatment.
reassurance: Your health and baby come first.

explanation: IVF ke dauran bina pani ka vrat rakhna safe nahi hai. Dehydration se nuksan ho sakta hai.
next_steps: Please fruits aur pani lete rahein.
reassurance: God samjhenge.

explanation: Limit caffeine to 200mg (1-2 cups) per day.
next_steps: Switch to decaf or herbal tea.
reassurance: You don't have to quit completely.

explanation: Coughing/Sneezing does NOT expel the embryo.
next_steps: Take Paracetamol for fever. Avoid Ibuprofen.
reassurance: Embryo is safe.

explanation: You can sleep on back, stomach, or side right now.
next_steps: Left side is best only in late pregnancy (after 20 weeks).
reassurance: Sleep however you are comfortable.

explanation: Noticed a blue/black bruise at the injection site? This happens if a tiny capillary was hit. It looks scary but is harmless.
next_steps: Apply Ice Pack for 10 mins. Avoid injecting exactly on the bruise tomorrow.
reassurance: It will fade in 3-5 days like any other bruise. It does not affect medication absorption.

explanation: Injection wali jagah par neel (bruise) padna normal hai. Kabhi kabhi choti nas dab jati hai.
next_steps: Barf (Ice) lagayein. Kal dusri taraf injection lagayein.
reassurance: Isse dawai ke asar par koi farak nahi padta.

explanation: Redness and itching immediately after Cetrotide/Orgalutran is a known local reaction.
next_steps: Do not scratch. Wipe with a cool damp cloth.
reassurance: It usually settles within 30-60 minutes.

explanation: Feeling teary or angry? High estrogen levels can make you feel like you have extreme PMS.
next_steps: Warn your partner/family that it's the meds talking!
reassurance: You are not going crazy. It's the hormones.

explanation: You mentioned your jeans are tight. This is NOT fat gain. It is water retention and enlarged ovaries.
next_steps: Wear loose, elastic-waist pants (leggings).
reassurance: This 'weight' will drop off quickly after your period starts post-cycle.

explanation: Agar pet phoola hua lag raha hai, toh ye fat nahi hai. Ye ovaries ka size badhne ki wajah se hai.
next_steps: Dheele kapde pehnein.
reassurance: Treatment khatam hote hi ye wapis normal ho jayega.

explanation: Feeling dizzy? It can happen due to blood pressure changes from meds.
next_steps: Sit down immediately. Drink salty lime water or ORS.
reassurance: Rest for an hour.

explanation: Sore breasts are due to high progesterone. It is normal.
next_steps: Wear a supportive sports bra.
reassurance: Sign meds are working.

explanation: Some medications (like Lupron) lower estrogen initially, causing dryness.
next_steps: You can use a water-based lubricant if needed.
reassurance: This is temporary.

explanation: Headaches are common when estrogen drops (suppression phase).
next_steps: Drink 3L water. You can take Paracetamol 650mg.
reassurance: It usually stops once stimulation injections begin.

explanation: Gentle Yoga is great! But avoid 'Twists', 'Inversions' (Headstand), and 'Hot Yoga'.
next_steps: Stick to breathing exercises (Pranayama) and stretching.
reassurance: Blood flow to the pelvis helps egg quality.

explanation: Halka Yoga safe hai. Par pet par dabav dalne wale aasan (poses) na karein.
next_steps: Kapalbhati avoid karein.
reassurance: Anulom-Vilom best hai stress ke liye.

explanation: You asked about Acupuncture. Studies show it can help reduce stress and improve blood flow before transfer.
next_steps: If you wish to try, do a session 24 hours before transfer.
reassurance: It is safe to combine with IVF.

explanation: Sleep is when your cells repair. Try to get 7-8 hours in total darkness.
next_steps: Melatonin supplements (if prescribed) help egg quality + sleep.
reassurance: Good sleep = Better hormones.

explanation: Strictly NO alcohol during stimulation and after transfer.
next_steps: Husband should also limit intake (affects sperm quality).
reassurance: Mocktails are your friend for now!

explanation: Hair dye is generally safe, but avoid strong chemical straightening treatments. Gel nails are fine but ensure good ventilation.
next_steps: Choose ammonia-free dye if possible.
reassurance: Looking good helps you feel good!

explanation: Gentle massage is okay. Deep tissue on tummy is NOT allowed.
next_steps: Avoid Saunas/Steam rooms (Overheating is bad for eggs/embryos).
reassurance: Foot massage is perfect.

explanation: Swimming is fine during early stims. Stop 3 days before retrieval (risk of infection).
next_steps: Avoid swimming after Transfer (vaginal progesterone washes out).
reassurance: Walking is the best alternative.

explanation: Cuddling your dog/cat reduces stress! Just don't let them jump on your tummy post-surgery.
next_steps: If you have a cat, ask someone else to change the litter box (Toxoplasmosis risk).
reassurance: Pets are great therapy.

explanation: Extreme fasting raises cortisol. During IVF, we prefer steady blood sugar levels.
next_steps: Eat small regular meals rather than fasting for 16 hours.
reassurance: Your body thinks 'famine' is a bad time to reproduce.

explanation: As per policy, since the cycle was cancelled for medical reasons before retrieval, we will refund the 'Procedure Charges'.
next_steps: However, costs for medicines used and scans performed are non-refundable.
reassurance: We will process the eligible amount within 7 working days.

explanation: Cycle cancel hone par hum Doctor fee aur OT charges wapis kar denge. Dawai ka paisa wapis nahi hota.
next_steps: Accounts department aapko final hisaab bhejega.
reassurance: Transparency humara rule hai.

explanation: IVF is a medical treatment. We can provide a stamped receipt.
next_steps: Please note: Most standard insurance does not cover IVF, so check with your CA for tax deduction eligibility.
reassurance: Receipt will be emailed.

explanation: Your IVF package is valid for 6 months. It expires on {{date}}.
next_steps: Please schedule your cycle before this date to avoid price hikes.
reassurance: Call to extend.

explanation: Since you cancelled the retrieval at the last minute, the OT slot was wasted.
next_steps: There is a nominal rescheduling fee of â‚¹{{fee}} to book the anesthetist again.
reassurance: I hope you understand the operational cost.

explanation: Received â‚¹{{amount}} via UPI/NEFT.
next_steps: Balance pending: â‚¹{{balance}}.
reassurance: Your slot is confirmed.

explanation: You can close your medical loan early with no penalty.
next_steps: Contact the loan provider directly.
reassurance: We have sent the 'Treatment Complete' letter.

explanation: Here is your medical certificate for 'Gynecological Procedure' (we don't write IVF to protect privacy).
next_steps: Recommended rest: 2 days.
reassurance: Confidentiality maintained.

explanation: We updated your address in our system.
next_steps: Important for courier delivery of meds.
reassurance: Records current.

explanation: We can issue a duplicate discharge summary.
next_steps: Fee: â‚¹200. Processing: 24 hours.
reassurance: Digital copy is free.

explanation: Your embryos have been with us for 2 years! Renewal fee is due.
next_steps: Pay to keep them safe for another year.
reassurance: They do not age in the freezer.

explanation: We received your request to discard remaining embryos since your family is complete.
next_steps: Both you and your husband must come to the clinic to sign the affidavit in front of a witness.
reassurance: We will handle them with respect.

explanation: Annual storage fee revised to â‚¹{{new_price}} from next month.
next_steps: Renew early to lock in old rate.
reassurance: Cost of liquid nitrogen increased.

explanation: We have not received storage fees for 2 years. We have tried contacting you multiple times.
next_steps: If not paid by {{date}}, we are legally authorized to discard the samples.
reassurance: Please don't let this happen.

explanation: Moving city? We can transfer your embryos to a clinic near you.
next_steps: Connect us with your new doctor.
reassurance: Cryo-shipping is very safe.

explanation: Ice the area. Wear tight underwear for support.
next_steps: Sperm improvement takes 3-6 months.
reassurance: Pain will subside in 2 days.

explanation: You mentioned having high fever (102F) last week. This can temporarily kill sperm production.
next_steps: We should delay the IVF/IUI cycle by 2-3 months to let new sperm grow.
reassurance: Using this sperm might lead to poor embryo quality.

explanation: Tez bukhar se sperm quality kharab ho jati hai.
next_steps: Cycle ko 2 mahine delay karna behtar hoga.
reassurance: Hume best result chahiye, isliye wait karna sahi hai.

explanation: Do not keep laptop on lap. The heat affects testicles.
next_steps: Use a table.
reassurance: Small changes matter.

explanation:
Myth: Long abstinence = More sperm. 
Fact: Old sperm has damaged DNA. 
Advice: 2-4 days gap is ideal.
next_steps: Ejaculate 3 days before pickup.
reassurance: Fresh is best.

explanation: It is very common to have trouble performing on the day of IUI/IVF due to pressure.
next_steps: We can prescribe a tablet (Viagra) to help, or you can collect at home if you live nearby.
reassurance: Don't be embarrassed. We see this daily.

explanation: Agar sample dene mein tension ho rahi hai, toh batayein. Hum medicine de sakte hain.
next_steps: Ghabrayein nahi.
reassurance: Ye stress ki wajah se hota hai, normal hai.

explanation: Avoid standard lubricants (KY/Durex) - they kill sperm.
next_steps: Use 'Pre-Seed' or fertility-friendly lube.
reassurance: Or use canola oil (natural).

explanation: Wear loose boxers to keep testicles cool.
next_steps: Avoid tight jeans.
reassurance: Improves count.

explanation: Smoking causes DNA fragmentation in sperm. This leads to miscarriage for your wife.
next_steps: Stop NOW.
reassurance: Sperm regenerates every 3 months. You can fix this.

explanation: Aap keh rahe the ki 'Nazar' lag jayegi agar kisi ko bataya. Aap confidential rakh sakte hain.
next_steps: Hum clinic mein kisi ko aapka naam reveal nahi karte.
reassurance: Science aur Faith dono apni jagah hain.

explanation: Grahan mein injection lena ya bahar nikalna mana nahi hai medical science mein.
next_steps: Treatment schedule na todein.
reassurance: Baby safe hai.

explanation: Kesar lene se baby gora hoga - ye myth hai. Genetics rang decide karta hai.
next_steps: Kesar healthy hai, par limit mein lein (body heat).
reassurance: Nutrition pe dhyaan dein.

explanation: Baingan (Eggplant) khane se miscarriage nahi hota. Ye safe hai.
next_steps: Sab tarah ki sabzi khayein.
reassurance: Darr nikalein.

explanation: You can visit temples/mosques. Just avoid crowded places to prevent infections (Flu/Covid) during pregnancy.
next_steps: Wear a mask.
reassurance: Prayers help positivity!

explanation: Wife ko injections ke waqt support karein. Emotional stress unke liye kharab hai.
next_steps: Ghar ke kaam mein madad karein.
reassurance: Happy wife = Successful IVF.

explanation: Aapne ladka/ladki janne ki baat ki. India mein ye illegal hai (PCPNDT Act). Hum jail ja sakte hain.
next_steps: Dobara ye sawal na puchein.
reassurance: Humare liye healthy baby important hai.

explanation: Diwali par mithai khayein, par sugar control mein rakhein (PCOS patients especially).
next_steps: 1-2 piece kaafi hain.
reassurance: Enjoy the festival.

explanation: IVF does NOT mean mandatory C-Section. If no complications, you can have a vaginal birth.
next_steps: Discuss with your OB.
reassurance: Your body knows what to do.

explanation: IVF pregnancy mein normal delivery ho sakti hai. Operation tabhi hoga agar medical zaroorat ho.
next_steps: Darna nahi hai.
reassurance: Precious baby hai, safety first.

explanation: Poore 9 mahine bed rest ki zaroorat nahi hoti (unless bleeding ho). Active rehna achha hai.
next_steps: Ghar ke chhote kaam karein.
reassurance: Blood clot se bachne ke liye chalna zaroori hai.

explanation: Thinking of banking baby's cord blood? It stores stem cells for future use.
next_steps: We have tie-ups with Cryoviva/LifeCell.
reassurance: Optional but good insurance.

explanation: Delivery ke time baby ki cord se blood save kar sakte hain future bimariyon ke liye.
next_steps: Costly hai par safety hai.
reassurance: Soch lijiye.

explanation: Watching you go from a nervous patient to a mother has been our privilege.
next_steps: Visit us with the baby!
reassurance: You are going to be amazing parents.

explanation: Aaj humara saath yahi tak tha. Aapki godh bhar gayi, hume aur kya chahiye.
next_steps: Baby ko lekar milne aana.
reassurance: Humari duayein aapke saath hain.

explanation: Agar aapka transfer ho chuka hai, toh please 'Herbal Gulal' hi use karein. Chemical colors skin se absorb hokar nuksan kar sakte hain.
next_steps: Pani wali Holi avoid karein (fisalne/slip hone ka darr rehta hai).
reassurance: Thoda tika lagana safe hai. Enjoy the sweets!

explanation: If you are stimulating or pregnant, strict fasting (Upvas) is NOT recommended. Acidity and dehydration trigger nausea.
next_steps: You can eat 'Phalahar' (Fruits/Sabudana) frequently. Do not stay empty stomach for >3 hours.
reassurance: Devotion shouldn't cost your health.

explanation: You asked if being Vegetarian reduces IVF success. No, it doesn't, BUT you need to work harder for protein.
next_steps: Since you don't eat eggs/chicken, please add Paneer, Tofu, Soya chunks, and Sprouts to *every* meal.
reassurance: We can add a protein powder supplement if needed.

explanation: Kya Auto-Rickshaw mein travel karna safe hai? Haan, par khadde (potholes) se bachein.
next_steps: Driver ko dhire chalane ko bolein.
reassurance: Uterus mein baby bubble wrap jaisa safe hota hai. Jhatke se nahi girta.

explanation: You are worried about hiding injections from in-laws. We can switch your protocol to 'Clinic Injections' only.
next_steps: You can come here daily for the shot, so no meds are kept in your fridge at home.
reassurance: We will mark the file 'Confidential - Do not call landline'.

explanation: You are the designated 'Nurse' tonight! Watch the video on how to mix Menopur.
next_steps: Wash hands, pinch her skin gently, inject slowly.
reassurance: Your involvement statistically lowers her stress levels.

explanation: As per ART Act 2021, Aadhaar card of both partners is mandatory for creating embryos.
next_steps: Please WhatsApp photos of front/back today.
reassurance: Data is uploaded to National Registry (secure).

explanation: The new law requires you to purchase 36 months of health insurance for the surrogate mother.
next_steps: We have a tie-up with an insurance agent who handles ART specific policies.
reassurance: This covers any complications she might face.

explanation: Agar aap bed rest par hain (bleeding ki wajah se), toh maid ko samjha dein ki heavy saman aapko na uthana pade.
next_steps: Jhadu-pocha avoid karein (bending).
reassurance: Cooking (khana banana) safe hai.

explanation: Spicy food causes acidity/heartburn which is worse during pregnancy, but it does NOT harm the baby.
next_steps: If you crave spice, eat it in moderation.
reassurance: The uterus is protected from your stomach contents.

explanation: We need your best sample next week. Alcohol reduces sperm motility within 24 hours.
next_steps: Please abstain from drinking for 5 days before pickup.
reassurance: It makes a difference in fertilization rates.

explanation: Please leave your phone in the locker during Egg Pickup.
next_steps: Set an 'Out of Office' message for 4 hours.
reassurance: The sedation makes you groggy; you shouldn't talk to your boss anyway!

explanation: Please trim/shave private area before coming for Egg Retrieval.
next_steps: It reduces infection risk during the procedure.
reassurance: Do not use hair removal cream (chemical burns risk).

explanation: Procedure se pehle private part clean (shave/trim) karke aayein.
next_steps: Ye infection se bachne ke liye zaroori hai.
reassurance: Cream use na karein.

explanation: Remove all jewelry (rings/bangles/mangalsutra) before OT admission.
next_steps: Leave valuables at home.
reassurance: Safety protocol.

explanation: Please remove nail polish from at least one finger.
next_steps: We need to put the 'Pulse Oximeter' clip on your finger to check oxygen during surgery.
reassurance: Dark polish blocks the sensor.

explanation: Clinic mein sample dene mein awkward lag sakta hai. Humare pass private room with magazines/video hai.
next_steps: Agar aap ghar se sample lana chahte hain (within 45 mins), toh container le jayein.
reassurance: Ye bohot common hai, stress na lein.

explanation: Transferring husband's frozen sample from another city?
next_steps: Use 'Cryo-Ship' service. Do NOT carry in dry ice yourself on flight (Airport security won't allow).
reassurance: We will coordinate with the courier company.

explanation: Day 8 of 14. This is the hardest part. Stop staring at the calendar!
next_steps: Task for today: Watch a comedy movie or cook a new recipe.
reassurance: Laughter increases blood flow. Anxiety constricts it.

explanation: Aapne puchha tha Mandir ka Vibhuti/Prasad kha sakte hain? Haan, bilkul.
next_steps: Positive energy hamesha achhi hoti hai.
reassurance: Faith helps healing.

explanation: Asking for gender of embryo/fetus is a CRIME under PCPNDT Act.
next_steps: Punishable by jail for patient and doctor.
reassurance: We follow the law strictly.

explanation: You want twins, but medically, a singleton is safer. Twins have high risk of preterm birth and NICU stay.
next_steps: I strongly advise Single Embryo Transfer (SET) given your height/weight.
reassurance: One healthy baby is better than two premature ones.

explanation: Are you taking antibiotics for fever/infection? Some affect sperm motility.
next_steps: Let us know the name of the drug.
reassurance: We might need to delay pickup by a few days.

explanation: You can drive a car after transfer. Avoid two-wheelers (Scooty) on bad roads if possible due to bumps.
next_steps: Wear seatbelt - it protects you and the tummy.
reassurance: Driving doesn't compress the uterus.

explanation: Scooty chalana thoda risky ho sakta hai agar road kharab ho (jhatke lagte hain). Car chalana safe hai.
next_steps: Agar possible ho toh 2 weeks ke liye driver le lein.
reassurance: Safety first.

explanation: Now that you are pregnant, take the Flu Shot and Tetanus (TT) as per schedule.
next_steps: Safe in pregnancy.
reassurance: Protects baby after birth.

explanation: Dengue fever is dangerous in pregnancy. Use All-Out or Odomos.
next_steps: It is safe to apply on skin.
reassurance: Prevent bites.

explanation: Indian toilet use karna safe hai? Haan, squatting se embryo nahi girta.
next_steps: Bas pair fisalne ka dhyaan rakhein.
reassurance: Agar Western toilet hai toh wo zyada comfortable rahega.

explanation: Squatting (Indian toilet) puts no pressure on the uterus cavity.
next_steps: Use whatever you are used to.
reassurance: Totally safe.

explanation: Even if you smoke on the balcony, the smoke particles stick to your clothes and affect your pregnant wife.
next_steps: Second-hand smoke causes low birth weight.
reassurance: Please shower/change clothes before hugging her.

explanation: Badam aur Akhrot (Walnuts) daily khayein. Inme Omega-3 hota hai.
next_steps: Raat ko bhigo kar subah khayein.
reassurance: Brain development ke liye best hai.

explanation: Traveling to a different time zone? Keep the injection interval 24 hours.
next_steps: Adjust time gradually.
reassurance: Call us to calculate the new time.

explanation: Refund for cancelled cycle processed: â‚¹{{amount}}.

reassurance: See you for next cycle.

explanation: Download our Clinic App to see all reports.

explanation: Avoid heavy smoke from firecrackers. Pollution increases inflammation.
next_steps: Stay indoors or wear N95 mask.
reassurance: Clean air helps oxygenation.

explanation: Anesthesia slows down the gut. Constipation is normal for 2 days.
next_steps: Eat papaya.
reassurance: Don't stress.

explanation: You have fever today? We cannot use fresh sperm if fever >100F.
next_steps: We will use your frozen backup sample.
reassurance: Good thing we froze it last month!

explanation: You are still breastfeeding your first child? Prolactin levels will be high.
next_steps: You must wean completely before we start the next IVF stimulation.
reassurance: Meds pass through milk, so weaning is safer.

explanation: Aapke pass Gonal-F bach gaya hai? Hum wapis nahi le sakte (rules).
next_steps: Aap kisi needy patient ko donate kar sakte hain clinic mein.
reassurance: Kisi ki dua milegi.

explanation: If you are happy with our service, please review us.
next_steps: Helps others find us.
reassurance: Thank you.

explanation: Enjoy your baby shower! Send us photos.
next_steps: Don't get too tired standing.
reassurance: You look glowing!

explanation: For your surrogate baby, we need to apply for the passport immediately after birth.
next_steps: We will provide the birth certificate and DNA test proof.
reassurance: Our legal team will assist.

explanation: We have uploaded your injection calendar to the app.
next_steps: Check dates.
reassurance: Alerts set.

explanation: Please save our Night Emergency Number: {{emergency_phone}}.
next_steps: Star it in your contacts.
reassurance: Available 24/7.

explanation: Humara safar yahan khatam hota hai. Aap parents ban gaye!
next_steps: Zindagi bhar ki khushiyan mubarak ho.
reassurance: God bless.

greeting: Hi {{patient_name}}! Wonderful news regarding your embryos! ðŸŒŸðŸ§¬
context: We have received the PGT-A (genetic testing) report from the lab today.
explanation: Great news: Out of the {{embryo_count}} embryos sent for biopsy, ALL came back as 'Euploid' (chromosomally normal). This is the best possible outcome! These embryos have the correct number of chromosomes (46), which significantly increases implantation success rates to ~60-70% and reduces miscarriage risk.
next_steps: We can now plan for a Frozen Embryo Transfer (FET). We will wait for your period to start. Please message us on Day 1 of your next cycle.
reassurance: This validates that your egg quality is excellent. We have a very strong starting point for your pregnancy journey. ðŸ’š
call_to_action: Enjoy this victory! Please acknowledge this message so we know you've received the good news.

greeting: Hello {{patient_name}}, this is Dr. {{doctor_name}}. Is now a good time to talk privately?
context: [GENTLE TONE] I have received the PGT-A genetic report for your embryos, and I'm afraid the news is difficult today.
explanation: Unfortunately, all {{embryo_count}} embryos tested as 'Aneuploid'. [PAUSE] This means they had chromosomal abnormalitiesâ€”either missing or extra chromosomesâ€”which makes them incompatible with life. If we had transferred these, it would have resulted in a negative test or a miscarriage.
next_steps: [EMPATHY] I know this is heartbreaking. We need to pause and review the full report together. There are optionsâ€”changing the stimulation protocol to improve quality, considering dual-stim, or discussing donor gametes depending on the specific genetic errors found.
reassurance: [GENTLE] Please know this is not because of anything you did wrong. This is a biological hurdle, common with age or specific genetic factors. The silver lining is that PGT-A saved you from the emotional trauma of a miscarriage or failed transfer.
call_to_action: Take some time to process this. When you are ready, let's meet in person on {{next_consult_date}} to map out a new strategy. We are not giving up on you.

greeting: Hi {{patient_name}}, regarding your query about PGT-A testing. ðŸ§¬ðŸ¤”
context: Aapne poocha tha ki genetic testing (PGT-A) karwana zaroori hai ya nahi.
explanation: Dekhiye, PGT-A extra cost add karta hai (approx â‚¹15-20k per embryo), but iske benefits long-term mein cost-saving ho sakte hain. Normal IVF mein hum sirf embryo ki 'shape' (morphology) dekhte hain, par PGT-A se hume 'DNA' ka pata chalta hai. Agar embryo genetically abnormal hua, toh transfer fail hoga ya miscarriage hoga.
next_steps: Agar aapki age 35+ hai ya previous miscarriages huye hain, toh Dr. {{doctor_name}} strongly recommend karte hain. Agar age kam hai, toh hum skip bhi kar sakte hain.
reassurance: Isse 'Time to Pregnancy' kam ho jata hai kyunki hum sirf best embryo transfer karte hain. Blind firing nahi hoti.
call_to_action: Please discuss with {{partner_name}} and let us know by tomorrow morning before the biopsy deadline.

greeting: {{patient_name}}, this is Dr. {{doctor_name}}. I am calling about the symptoms you reported.
context: [URGENT] Based on your bloating and difficulty breathing, I suspect you have developed severe Ovarian Hyperstimulation Syndrome (OHSS).
explanation: Your ovaries have responded too strongly to the medication, causing fluid to leak into your abdomen (ascites). This is why you feel breathless and your urine output has dropped. This requires immediate medical management to balance your fluids and prevent clots.
next_steps: [DIRECTIVE] You need to be admitted to the hospital immediately for IV fluids and monitoring. Do not eat or drink anything for now. Pack a bag for 2-3 days.
reassurance: This is a known complication and is completely treatable. By admitting you, we can resolve this much faster and ensure you are safe. It does NOT affect your frozen embryosâ€”they remain safe.
call_to_action: Please go to {{hospital_name}} Emergency Room immediately. I have already called the admission desk. They are expecting you.

greeting: {{patient_name}}, it's Dr. {{doctor_name}}. I need to discuss the lab results from yesterday's retrieval.
context: [GENTLE/SERIOUS] I have some unexpected and difficult news regarding the fertilization of your eggs.
explanation: Despite retrieving {{total_eggs}} eggs and performing ICSI (injecting sperm directly), none of the eggs have fertilized normally to form embryos. This is called 'Total Fertilization Failure'. It is a rare occurrence (1-3% of cycles) usually caused by an activation issue within the egg or sperm that we couldn't see beforehand.
next_steps: This cycle will not result in a transfer. We need to investigate if 'Oocyte Activation' (calcium ionophore) can help in a future cycle, or analyze the sperm DNA fragmentation more deeply.
reassurance: [EMPATHY] I know this is a shock. It feels like a complete stop, but it is actually a diagnostic answer. Now we know exactly where the block is occurring. We can try specific protocols to overcome this activation failure next time.
call_to_action: Please come in for a counseling session on {{next_consult_date}}. We need to support you through this loss before planning next steps.

greeting: Hi {{patient_name}}, hope you are resting after the procedure. ðŸŒ¸
context: Main Dr. {{doctor_name}} ki taraf se aaj ke Egg Retrieval ke baare mein update de rahi hoon.
explanation: Aaj procedure mein humne dekha ki follicles toh the, par unme se eggs retrieve nahi huye. Isse 'Empty Follicle Syndrome' kehte hain. Sometimes trigger injection (HCG) body mein theek se absorb nahi hota, ya eggs follicle wall se detach nahi huye.
next_steps: Abhi ke liye aap medications stop kar dijiye. Period aane ka wait karein. Next cycle mein hum different trigger protocol use karenge to ensure eggs release hon.
reassurance: Ye bohot frustrating hai, I know. Par iska matlab ye nahi ki aapke paas eggs nahi hain. Ye aksar 'drug delivery' issue hota hai, egg reserve issue nahi. Next time protocol change se results better milne chahiye.
call_to_action: Aaj rest karo aur fluids (pani/juice) zyada piyo. Hum kal subah aapko call karenge.

greeting: {{patient_name}}, this is Dr. {{doctor_name}}. I need to speak with you urgently.
context: [URGENT/SERIOUS] We've reviewed your latest ultrasound and beta hCG trends.
explanation: Your hCG levels are rising slowly, but we cannot see a gestational sac in the uterus. There is a strong suspicion of an 'Ectopic Pregnancy', where the embryo has implanted in the fallopian tube instead of the uterus. This is a medical emergency because the tube can rupture.
next_steps: You need to come to the clinic NOW. We likely need to administer an injection called Methotrexate to stop the pregnancy from growing and protect your tube, or we may need laparoscopic surgery.
reassurance: The priority right now is your safety. By catching this early, we hope to manage it with medication rather than surgery, preserving your fertility for the future.
call_to_action: Are you near the clinic? Please come immediately. Do not eat or drink anything in case surgery is needed.

context: Aapka 'Two Week Wait' period chal raha hai aur hum jante hain ye time sabse mushkil hota hai.
explanation: Abhi embryo implantation process chal raha hai. Aapko shayad mild cramping ya spotting feel hoâ€”ye normal hai. Google symptoms search karke panic mat hona, kyunki progesterone meds ke symptoms pregnancy jaise hi hote hain.
next_steps: Apne medicines time pe lete raho. Beta HCG test {{beta_date}} ko scheduled hai. Urine test ghar pe mat karna (false negative aa sakta hai).
reassurance: Stress lene se outcome change nahi hoga, par aapki tabiyat kharab ho sakti hai. Be kind to yourself. Movie dekho, walk pe jao, distract raho. You have done everything right! âœ¨
call_to_action: Agar severe pain ya heavy bleeding ho toh turant call karein. Otherwise, see you on test day!

greeting: Hello {{patient_name}}, this is Counselor {{nurse_name}} calling from the clinic.
context: [SOFT/EMPATHETIC] I wanted to check on you a few days after your results. I know this is a very dark time.
explanation: A failed cycle brings a very specific type of griefâ€”it is a loss of a hope and a future you were imagining. It is completely normal to feel angry, numb, or jealous of others right now. Your hormones are also crashing, which makes the emotions more intense.
next_steps: There is no rush to decide on the next cycle. Dr. {{doctor_name}} is reviewing your file to see what we can tweak, but right now, your job is just to heal.
reassurance: Please remember: A negative result is NOT a reflection of your worth as a woman or mother. Even the best embryos sometimes don't stick. Many of our success stories happen on the 2nd or 3rd attempt.
call_to_action: I'm sending you a link to our support group meeting this Saturday, if you feel like listening to others. No pressure to talk. Take care of yourself.

greeting: Hi {{patient_name}}, just checking in gently. ðŸ’š
context: Treatment ke dauran family aur relatives ka pressure kabhi kabhi bohot heavy ho jata hai.
explanation: India mein aksar log poochte hain 'Khush khabri kab sunaoge?'. Ye sun kar stress hona natural hai. Yaad rakhiye, IVF stress-sensitive process hai. Cortisol (stress hormone) badhne se health pe asar padta hai.
next_steps: Apne aur {{partner_name}} ke beech ek 'bubble' banao. Decide karo ki kisko kitna batana hai. 'Medical treatment chal raha hai' bol kar topic change karna okay hai.
reassurance: Ye journey aapki hai. Aapko kisi ko bhi justification dene ki zaroorat nahi hai. Hum aapke saath hain. Strong raho! ðŸ’ª
call_to_action: Agar stress manage nahi ho raha, toh let us know. Humare counselor se baat karke bohot relief milta hai.

greeting: Hi {{patient_name}}, this is the finance manager, [Name]. Do you have a moment?
context: Dr. {{doctor_name}} mentioned you were worried about the costs for the upcoming cycle steps.
explanation: IVF is a significant investment, and financial anxiety is very real. We want to make sure money doesn't become the barrier to your treatment. The upcoming PGT-A and FET steps are estimated at roughly â‚¹{{cost_estimate}}.
next_steps: We have partnerships with 0% EMI medical loan providers. We can split the payment into 6, 9, or 12 installments. We can also look at a 'freeze-all' approach to spread the cost over a few months.
reassurance: We are transparent about billingâ€”no hidden costs. We can sit down and prioritize which add-ons are medically necessary vs. optional to optimize your budget.
call_to_action: Can you come in 30 minutes before your next scan to review the EMI options? I can have the paperwork ready.

context: Your protocol starts soon. Here are instructions for ordering your stimulation medications.
next_steps: Please order today to ensure you have them by Day 2. You can buy from our in-house pharmacy or any authorized fertility chemist.
reassurance: Don't be intimidated by the needles! We will teach you exactly how to mix and inject on Day 2. Most patients find it much easier than they expected.
call_to_action: Once delivered, send us a photo of the boxes so we can verify you have the correct dosage. Start date is tentative for {{next_scan_date}}.

context: Reminder: Aapka Follicular Study Scan kal hai.
explanation: Date: {{next_scan_date}} | Time: {{appt_time}}
next_steps: Bladder empty karke scan room mein aana. Apne injection file saath layein.
reassurance: Hum check karenge ki follicles size increase ho raha hai ya nahi.
call_to_action: Late mat hona please. Confirm reply 'YES' karein.

greeting: {{patient_name}}, {{partner_name}}, thank you for coming in today.
context: [GENTLE/PROFESSIONAL] We are having this meeting to discuss the difficult topic of where we stand medically after {{cycle_count}} cycles.
explanation: Reviewing the data: your ovarian reserve (AMH) has dropped to {{amh_value}}, and we have not been able to generate euploid embryos in the last three attempts despite high stimulation. Medically, the probability of success with your own eggs has dropped to <5%.
next_steps: We have two ethical paths: 1. Moving to Donor Eggs, which brings success rates up to 60-70%. 2. Choosing to stop treatment and explore adoption or child-free living.
reassurance: [EMPATHY] This is not a failure of will or effort. You have fought incredibly hard. Sometimes, the bravest decision is to stop the physical toll on your body. There is no 'right' choice here, only what is right for your mental peace and your marriage.
call_to_action: I don't want an answer today. Go home, take a month off from clinics/meds. Let's reconnect when you feel ready to decide the direction.
